document_data.name: ''Legacy of the Oni''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Legacy of the Oni''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[katana]] of [[Kara-Tur]]an origins.
document_data.Powers: This exotic sword was imbued with powerful magics. It's slashing edge was enchanted with a ''+5'' enchantment. Additionally, the ''Legacy of the Oni'' granted the wielder magical resistance to slashing and piercing damage and gave them the benefits of rite ''[[freedom]]'' spell.
document_data.History:
The ''Legacy of the Oni'' originated from the land of [[Kara-Tur]] where it was likely crafted by an ambitious [[oni mage]] who had certain plans on conquering the lands to the west. However, the history of the katana remained mostly unknown.

''Circa'' [[1373 DR]], the ''Legacy of the Oni'' was in possession of one of the head priestess of the [[House of the Moon (Thentia)|House of the Moon]] of [[Thentia]], [[Moonsea]].
